content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to current news and events. However, here are some examples of how Malaysian businesses have collaborated with each other and external partners to strengthen their sustainability efforts:

1. through partnerships with NGOs and government agencies to promote sustainable practices

2. through collaborations with academic institutions to develop sustainable technologies and innovations

3. through sharing best practices and knowledge with other businesses in industry associations and networks

4. through investments in sustainable projects and initiatives with external investors and stakeholders

5. through joint ventures and strategic partnerships aimed at achieving common sustainability goals

Overall, these collaborations have helped Malaysian businesses to adopt good sustainability practices and reduce environmental impacts while also creating social and economic benefits for their stakeholders.
